text: The Zambia National U-20 Football is a national association football team from Zambia. They have qualified for the FIFA U-20 World Cup three (3) times. ==FIFA U-20 World Cup appearances== * 1977 to 1997 - Did not enter * 1999 - Round 1 * 2001 - Did not qualify * 2003 - Did not qualify * 2005 - Did not qualify * 2007 - Round 16 * 2009 - Did not qualify * 2011 - Did not qualify * 2013 - Did not qualify * 2015 - Did not qualify * 2017 - Quarter-finals ===2017 FIFA U-20 World Cup=== \---- \---- ===Round of 16=== ===Quarter- finals=== ===Final ranking=== As per statistical convention in football, matches decided in extra time are counted as wins and losses, while matches decided by penalty shoot-outs are counted as draws. Category:Football in Zambia Category:National sports teams of Zambia Category:African national under-20 football teams
title: Zambia national under-20 football team
